inscribed:
Titled and inscribed in plate, lower center to right: GVLA • / brueghel Inuentor / H • Cock • excud cum gratia et privilegio • 1558

One line of Latin and one line of Flemish inscribed in plate below image, lower center: EBRIETAS EST VITANDA, … Want ouerdaet doet god ten hem seluen vergheten.
